_header: It is unknow / What man built this city now
Bibliographic Ghosts: Glasgow, Glasgow University Library Hunterian 83 (T.3.21): this is Brut chronicle; New York, Pierpont Morgan Library M875 [olim Helmingham Hall]: Only Trevisa’s De Proprietatibus here, not Polychronicon.
_description: A verse insert on Chester Castle in Trevisa’s translation of Higden’s Polychronicon (Bk I, Cap. 48) — thirteen doggerel couplets

CamStJohn204.First Lines:
Hit is unknowewhat man bulde þis citee
                    nowe…
CamStJohn204.Last Lines: …Of kyng HaraldePoudre þere ȝit is halde

BLCottTibDVII.First Lines:
Chestre castel toun as a werename takþ of a
                    castel…
BLCottTibDVII.Last Lines:
…þar babilon looremore nyȝt haþ truthe þe
                    more

BLHar1900.First Lines:
It is vnknowewhat man bulde þis Cite
                    nowþo legecestria
                    þeshet now toun of legiones…
BLHar1900.Last Lines:
…Of kyng haraldepouder þere ȝet is y
                    halde

BLSto65.First Lines: It is unknowewhat man bulde þis cite nowe…
BLSto65.Last Lines:
…Of kyng haraldeponder þer ȝut is y
                    halde
BLSto65.Note:
Written as prose. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.

BLAdd24194.First Lines:
Hit is vnknowewhat man bude þis cite noweTho legecestrias
                    þesHett now toun of legiones…
BLAdd24194.Last Lines:
…Of kyng haraldePoudre þere ȝit is I
                    halde

AbeUL21.First Lines:
Chestre Casteltoun as a werename takeþ of a
                    castel…
AbeUL21.Last Lines:
…poudre þere ȝit is jhaldeBacchus & Mercurius.
                    Mars & venus also laverna

Chetham11379.First Lines:
Hyt ys onknowewhat man bulde þis cite noweþo
                    legescestria peshet now toun of legiones…
Chetham11379.Last Lines:
…And furþe henry kyngerþe ys þar riȝtene
                    dwellyng

HunHM28561.First Lines: It is vnknowewhat man bulde þis Cite nowe…
HunHM28561.Last Lines: …Of king heraldeponder þere yet is y halde
